channel.title: [317] NPC Drops Help [Deltascape]
channel.description: How do I change the drops of a npc and change how common of a drop it is? like if I want something to be really rare, and something else really common

item.title: [317] NPC Drops Help [Deltascape]
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

When I was looking over a delta source a while back I remember the drops being handled through a cfg file. Npcdrops.cfg perhaps?

Anyways, the way the drop system worked was:

npcdrop = npcId	itemId	amount	percentRarity

It could vary for you depending on the base youâ€™re using though.

Read full topic
